attributes.action: Give the British Public the chance to decide on the next PM. Hold a General Election on Mr Blairs Departure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you may well be aware, as it stands, when Tony Blair stands down as PM Gordon Brown looks set to automatically take over the premiership. 
Judging by this years budget and browns policies, this could be very damaging for the UK.

The Prime Minister has always been chosen by the public, why should this change now to suit Gordon Brown.

I call now for the British Public to demand a General Election to decide on the next Prime Minister before its too late. After all its our right to choose our countrys leader, Not Labours!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
